text: Peng Lin Lin (; born 18 August 1998) is a Hong Kong professional footballer who currently plays for Hong Kong Premier League club Kitchee. ==Career== On 18 July 2018, Dreams FC signed Peng to his first professional contract. After Dreams FC decided to self-relegate, Peng was signed by fellow Hong Kong club Rangers on 1 August 2019.
